hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##the Desert Colossus## has #2# major items.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Magic Meter#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Eyeball Frog#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Game Key# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Medigoron).text: Did you know that Barinade is allergic to bananas?

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #flames in the royal tomb# reveal #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #a Huge Rupee# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Broken Sword# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #the Fire Arrows# and #a Bottom of the Well Small Key#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path to #Twinrova#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Climb North Chest

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Requiem of Spirit#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Eyeball Frog#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: Why are you asking me? I don't have any answers! I'm just as confused as you are!

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #the Light Arrows#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Crater## has #3# major items.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path to #Barinade#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #Queen Gohma#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Mask of Truth# yields #a Map of the Forest Temple#.

LW (Bridge).text: Ganondorf brushes his rotten teeth with salted slug flavoured tooth paste!

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly MQ Basement Near Switches Chest

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Slingshot# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that those who seek #sunken silver rupees# will find #the Kokiri Sword#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Underwater Silver Rupee Chest

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers a #stable#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Eyedrops# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Requiem of Spirit#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #Goron Shop#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that ##the Gerudo Training Ground## has #8# major items.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.
